71 inline bool CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::IsDocumentTypeSupported(const QByteArray& documentTypeId) const
72 {
73  return documentTypeId.isEmpty() || (documentTypeId == m_documentTypeId); // default or the same type is accepted
74 }
75 
76 
77 inline bool CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::IsViewTypeSupported(const QByteArray& viewTypeId) const
78 {
79  return viewTypeId.isEmpty() || (viewTypeId == m_viewTypeId); // default or the same type is accepted
80 }
